blazmod:Venustas.NAME: Venustas
blazmod:Venustas.FLAVOR: Only a leader who helps people regardless of their background can wield this blade.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn and whenever you change Stances, draw #b1 card, then discard #b1 card.

blazmod:Raikiri.NAME: Raikiri
DESCRIPTIONS: The third time you change Stances each combat, remove all your debuffs.

blazmod:BladeOfPurification.NAME: Blade of Purification
blazmod:BladeOfPurification.FLAVOR: Those who completes this blade's trials are freed from all impure thoughts.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an #yAttack that costs #b2 or more each turn, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

blazmod:ConfectionCutter.NAME: Confection Cutter
blazmod:ConfectionCutter.FLAVOR: Using a Katana to cut chocolate is far from State-of-the-art.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard your #b5th card each turn, gain #b1 #yStrength.

blazmod:EightLifeKatana.NAME: Eight-Life Katana
blazmod:EightLifeKatana.FLAVOR: The fate of every living creature in the sky rests within its eight gems.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random card with #yReverb from your draw pile to your hand.

blazmod:UnsignedBlade.NAME: Unsigned Blade
blazmod:UnsignedBlade.FLAVOR: A good blade needs no signation from its maker, its wielder is enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to yourself, gain #b5 #yBlock.

blazmod:SamuraiSword.NAME: Samurai Sword
blazmod:SamuraiSword.FLAVOR: A true Samurai can use any blade they come across. Even this model blade, Gozaru!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your first #yAttack each turn deals #b1 damage.

blazmod:SoshuMasabe.NAME: Soshu Masamune
blazmod:SoshuMasabe.FLAVOR: This blade shows its true worth only to those who have attained enlightenment.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of your turn and whenever you change Stances, draw #b2 card, then discard #b2 cards.

blazmod:Vyxaba.NAME: Vyxaba
blazmod:Vyxaba.FLAVOR: Oira! Punk! Witness the true power of Vyrn, the likes of which you have never seen before.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate a card in your deck. NL The first time you play a card each turn, add a random card with that card's name from your draw pile to your hand.
